page.title: 05Sandbeck Lake
page.content: Our school caretaker goes angling at{ {Sandbeck Lower Lake.}He is part of{ {Maltby Colliery Angling Club}which has a 7year lease. An electronic count two years ago showed 2,800 roach 2,400 perch 150/200 tench 17pike. Others are rudd and carp.A{permit}is Â£10 annually plus Â£3.75 Trent River Licence.The season is 16th June to 16th March.The lake has 49 fishing places.Monthly{ {matches}are held on a Sunday.At 6.30am a whistle goes to start the competition by 11.30am another whistle goes for stopping.If there is a fish on your rod you are allowed 15minutes to try and get the fish.On the first day of the season people arrive early 3.00am can find you being one of thirty.Even so a dawn curfew is enforced.There are many rules for members but to follow the{country {code}is more than adequate.
